actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A concurrent resolution authorizing use of the rotunda of the Capitol for a ceremony incident to placement of a bust of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. in the Capitol and authorizing printing of the transcript of proceedings of that ceremony.

summary.text: Directs the Joint Committee on the Library to temporarily place a bust of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr., in the rotunda of the Capitol. Authorizes use of the rotunda, on an appropriate date in January 1986, for a ceremony dedicating the bust. Directs that such proceedings be printed as a House Document.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing use of the rotunda of the Capitol for a ceremony incident to placement of a bust of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. in the Capitol and authorizing printing of the transcript of proceedings of that ceremony.
